description: This polo will have your back without sticking to it, all summer long. The light, breathable, and moisture-wicking Pique Polo has a polyester knit fabric that dries quickly and protects you from the sun, so you can challenge your boss to another nine holes and still look fresh back at the office. Don't sweat the summer bike commute, the Windridge Polo will get you to work and back without needing an extra set of clothes (or a shower). This classic 2-button polo will keep you cool and comfortable when collars are a must, whether you're flipping burgers at the family cookout or looking to impress on a hot summer hike or night.
name: Marmot Windridge Pique Polo - Mens
